sentences: Nooremseersanti auaste j채rgmine astme on seersant.
context: The Estonian word 'seersant' refers to a military rank, specifically the rank of sergeant in many countries. It is an NCO (non-commissioned officer) position that comes after private and before higher ranks like staff sergeant or master sergeant. The word can be used in compound forms such as 'nooremseersant' (junior sergeant) and 'vanemseersant' (senior sergeant).
